lines.text:
[smelling Jennifer's home-made pie]
I think I'm gonna have an orgasm!
Who is she, anyway?
She's just some young, American housewife. Just an ordinary, young, American housewife, getting her kicks.
Mama, why don't you get married again? You're young and pretty...
But why get married?
Oh, I don't know. But you like to bake and you like to cook...
Oh, I don't think I'd ever get married again, even if I found another man. I'd probably just go off and live with him for awhile, as long as it lasted.
Why shouldn't it last? That sounds cynical.
Oh, Carole, even nice things don't last.
[VHS version]
I'll bet your old lady is just as hot and juicy as you are! And I ain't gonna be happy 'til I pour my juice to your momma, just like I done to you!
Hi, Mrs. Robinson.
What about Ann? Isn't she enough for you?

[laughs]
You're kidding!

[to Jennifer]
Your tits drive me outta my bird!
Mama... Pete and Anna and Eddie and I, we're a foursome.
I don't wanna be a source of trouble between Anna & Pete.

Mama, you're not listening! The four of us are very close friends. Pete screws me, with Anna and Eddie in the same room. They're screwing too, Mama. They're screwing each other. And there are other combinations, too numerous to mention.
You're a swinger? My little girl? My baby is a husband-swapper!
Mama, I can tell you now. I'm a very hot, horny girl. I discovered that in high school. After I married Eddie and we moved here...
Wasn't he... horny enough for you?

Yes, Mama. He's ready at the drop of a pair of panties. The day Anna and Pete moved in next door, Pete began to drop in, while Eddie was at work. It was nice, very nice. 'Til Eddie walked in on us one day.
What did they do? Fight over you?
No. It was very civilized. We called Anna in and told her. Then we decided that, since we were all attracted to each other, we could share each other, without jealousy, without anxiety.

[to Anna]
It was my turn last night. It's your turn tonight. We're just gonna split you right up the middle, baby, so be ready!
[after Jennifer gets felt up by Shandara]
I think she likes your vibrations.
She doesn't exactly hate my tits either!
[VHS version]

[while fingering Jennifer]
By Kali, you must renounce the tainted world!
Yeah, everybody goes for Mama. They always did. I sorta feel like I'm in her shadow. Again.

[to Jennifer]
You must think I spend all my time fingering you.
Mama, is all this too much for you?

You mean, the pleasure? I suppose I should lie to you now, tell you I'm repelled by it. I should urge you, my child, towards a life of monogamy. But, I can't. Because I love it, Carole. I love every spasm, every quiver, every orgasm.
I am your daughter. There's no doubt about that.
Jennifer, I've got a chance for a job, on the west coast. Would you... would you go there with me?
What about Carole?
I'm asking *you* to go with me.
Why me?
Where do I start? You're exciting.
Carole's not exciting?
Carole's exciting too. But you flip me out.
Mama, you're much older than he is!
So, I'll enjoy it while it lasts. Nothing is permanent, baby, nothing.
But why? Why you leaving with this guy?
You're wanted here very much.
You all want me.
[kisses Carole goodbye]
But, he needs me.
I love you, baby.
I know that, Mama.
As a matter of fact, I love you all. Perhaps too much.

She left because of me. Mama... Mama knew that... we were developing feelings about each other. Feelings... always there under different guises. Feelings that neither one of us could handle. They once came to the surface.
I understand, Carole.
[indicating Pete & Eddie]
They'd never understand.
